job.title: Senior Software Engineer
job.description:
Apply today if you are a Senior Software Engineer looking for a growing company in the Storage Industry
Title:
Senior Software Engineer
Location:
Salt Lake City, UT
Salary:
$110,000 - $140,000
Tech Stack:
.NET/C# | AWS | Angular
Our company has been around for about 50 years and continues to grow and be voted by Forbes as one of the best places to work. We are looking for an experienced software engineer to join our team and focus on development in our web applications that support our nationwide operations.
What You Will Be Doing
Write and maintain our current code base
Evaluate technical plans and implementation
Mentor and train other junior developers
Recommend and learn new technology options.
What You Need for this Position
C#
SQL Server
ASP.NET Web API
AngularJS
Nice To Have
automated testing and deployment
AWS platforms including SQS, SNS, SWF, S3, and RDS
What's In It for You
Competitive base salary and overall compensation package
Full benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision
401 (K) with generous company match
Vacation, sick, and paid holidays
Life Insurance coverage
So, if you are a Senior Software Engineer with experience, please apply today!
Apply directly to this job opening here!
Or
E-mail directly for more information to trent@cybercoders.com
Email Your Resume In Word To
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Trent.Roberts@CyberCoders.com
Please do NOT change the email subject line in any way. You must keep the JobID: linkedin : TR1-1637909 -- in the email subject line for your application to be considered.***
Trent Roberts - Sr. Executive Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
CyberCoders, Inc is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
Your Right to Work
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
